However, although studying through distance learning should motivate you to learn to study independently, independent study may not be easy for you. Studying alone can at times be indeed a lonely experience, which may affect your success. This is because in the distance education environment, minimal, yet vital interaction takes place between yourself and your lecturers and between yourself and other students in the same module.
